panels.title: ⚡ Total Ads Discovered (per minute)
panels.description: Real-time rate of ads discovered per minute. Independent of time window selection. Use for monitoring and alerting.

panels.title: ⚡ Search Execution Rate (per minute)
panels.description: Real-time rate of searches executed per minute. Independent of time window selection.

panels.title: 📊 Total Ads Discovered (time window)
panels.description: ⚠️ Total ads discovered over selected time window. Values INCREASE with longer time windows.

panels.title: 📊 Total Matches Found (time window)
panels.description: ⚠️ Total matches found over selected time window. Values INCREASE with longer time windows.

panels.title: 📊 Total Errors (time window)
panels.description: ⚠️ Total errors over selected time window. Values INCREASE with longer time windows. For real-time rate, see Error Rate panel.

panels.title: 📊 Total Tasks Created (time window)
panels.description: ⚠️ Total tasks created over selected time window. Values INCREASE with longer time windows.

panels.title: 📊 Proxy Request Counts: Success vs Failure by Marketplace
📊 $proxy_provider: Requests by Marketplace (time window)
panels.description: ⚠️ Total proxy requests over selected time window. Values INCREASE with longer time windows.

targets.expr: (  avg_over_time((   sum(rate(dealhunter_proxy_success_total{marketplace!~"global",job="dealhunter-prometheus-exporter"}[5m])) by (proxy_provider)   / clamp_min(    sum(rate(dealhunter_proxy_success_total{marketplace!~"global",job="dealhunter-prometheus-exporter"}[5m])) by (proxy_provider)    + sum(rate(dealhunter_proxy_failure_total{marketplace!~"global",job="dealhunter-prometheus-exporter"}[5m])) by (proxy_provider),    0.001   )  )[10m:1m]) * 100 ) and on(proxy_provider)  (sum(rate(dealhunter_proxy_success_total{job="dealhunter-prometheus-exporter"}[1h])) by (proxy_provider) > 0)

panels.title: Application Error Rate by Marketplace (per min)
⚡ IP Rotation Rate (per hour)
panels.description: Real-time rate of IP rotations per hour. Independent of time window selection.

panels.title: Redis Cache Hit Rate by Marketplace
Redis Cache Hit Rate Over Time (%)
Top 10 Error Types by Count (Dynamic Timeframe)

title: DealHunter Application Dashboard v6
description: DealHunter application monitoring dashboard with UX-compliant metric labeling and dynamic proxy discovery. All panels follow metric type conventions (⚡ rate, 📊 cumulative, 📈 percentage).
